title: Reading

content:
Hi! I’m Justin.
I am a software engineer with professional experience in full stack web development, with a particular interest in the design and implementation of well-scoped, loosely coupled APIs and services.
I also enjoy studying Italian and Greek to engage with primary sources of epic poetry, folklore, traditional music, and history in the original language.
Skills # Languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Kotlin, SQL Platforms: JVM, NodeJS, Docker, Google Cloud, AWS Frameworks: React, Spring Boot, Fastify Databases: Postgres, MSSQL Education # M.S. Computer Science, University of Southern Maine B.A. Major in English, Minor in Philosophy, Colby College Certifications #
title: About
